title: Shop price bug
body: I've been saving my ip for a few days and ive reached 7000, but when i try to purchase a champion that is 6300 it tells me i cannot purchase them because i dont have enough ip, plz rito bug fixes

replies.body:
Yeah, that's annoying, it's all over the place, thinks you have "random amount" less IP than you actually have.

PS: Hi!

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug?comment=000b

There's already been a thread made. A Riot employee has responded so you're best to keep an eye on this thread as he said he'd post updates when possible.
